alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 02 at 2:27PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Fairfield County through 315 PM EDT... At 226 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Bethel, or near Newtown, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Danbury, Newtown, Fairfield, Trumbull, Ridgefield, Monroe, Bethel, Wilton, Weston, Redding, Georgetown and Easton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
